This application is experimental software provided for testing and evaluation purposes only. It is not intended for general or production use, and its functionality may be incomplete, unstable, or unreliable.

The software is provided "as is", without any warranties—express or implied—including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

By using this application, you acknowledge and accept that you do so at your own risk. The author assumes no responsibility or liability for any damages, malfunctions, data loss, or adverse effects to vehicles, devices, or systems resulting from its use.

It is your responsibility to ensure the software is used in a controlled, safe, and appropriate environment. Use of this app constitutes acceptance of these terms.
